item.title: Ghost Recon Breakpoint
item.author: Author
item.description: Studio: Ubisoft Bordeaux Platform: PC/ PS4/ Xbox One Genre: Tactical Shooter Release Date: 10/04/2019 Period: September 2017 â€“ March 2019 My Role: Junior Gameplay Programmer Camp Team :  Improvement of the camp creation tool.  CampData creation management.  Spawn of events in the world at specific points. Drone Team :  Integration of the creation tool for the “fighting behaviour”.
